summary: This bill, the 'Ground and Orbital Launched Defeat of Emergent Nuclear Destruction and Other Missile Engagements Act of 2025' or the 'GOLDEN DOME Act of 2025,' focuses on enhancing U.S. missile defense capabilities. It mandates the development of a holistic missile defense strategy, including all-domain awareness, integrated command and control, and the appointment of a program manager. It accelerates the development of various technologies, including non-kinetic capabilities, AI-driven information fusion platforms, space-based sensors and interceptors, and ground mobile interceptors.  It also authorizes significant appropriations for these initiatives and aims to protect the space industrial base and U.S. assets.
